full_summary:
**Demolition of House 165 and Garage & Site Rehabilitation, Auyuittiuq National Park**

# Government of Canada Tender Announcement
## Solicitation Notice

### Title and Solicitation Information

* Sourcing Contract Title: Demolition of House 165 and Garage & Site Rehabilitation, Auyuittiuq National Park
* Solicitation Number: 5P468-22-0082/B
* Solicitation Status: Expired

### Description and Requirements

Parks Canada is seeking a qualified and experienced contractor to demolish a fire-damaged vacant staff house and garage in Auyuittiuq National Park, Nunavut Territory. The general requirements for the demolition process include:

* Demolition of building structures and foundations
* Removal of all waste materials
* Rehabilitation of the site
* Supply and placement of two 20-foot shipping containers for Parks Canada storage of vehicles and materials

The successful contractor will be responsible for ensuring safe handling and movement of vehicles and materials.

### Important Information

* **Two-Submission Bid Procedure**: The bid submission shall follow a two-submission procedure. Please refer to Special Instructions to Bidders (SI04) for more details.
* **Bonding and Insurance**: This project is estimated to be between $250,001 and $500,000, exclusive of taxes.
* **Submission Guidelines**: Only bids submitted by email to soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca will be accepted. Fax and in-person submissions are not acceptable.
* **Electronic File Size Limitation**: The maximum email file size that Parks Canada can receive is 15 megabytes. Bidders are responsible for any transmission issues due to file size or email size.
* **Enquiries**: Technical and contractual enquiries must be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority at least 5 business days before the tender closing date. Late enquiries may not be responded to.

### Possession and Performance Date
The contractor shall complete the work by no later than October 14, 2022.

### Comprehensive Land Claims Agreement
This procurement is subject to the Comprehensive Land Claims Agreement with Nunavut.

### Tender Documents
 Relevant documents can be accessed through the Government of Canada Tendering System at [www.buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders](http://www.buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders). Addenda, when issued, will be available from the Government of Canada Tendering System.

### Contact Information
For further information, please contact Cloë Pelland-Tessier at:

* Email: cloe.pelland
